apps.name: Offline Cards
apps.subtitle: Store discount cards offline
apps.localizedDescription: Store your discount and loyalty cards offline on your iPhone. Features include barcode/QR code display with automatic brightness, card photos, import/export, and quick search.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera is used to scan barcodes and take photos of your cards
